resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74943</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74943</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>3ead7db5-31cf-448a-8660-4b0762f79f3e#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Üregi nyúl fotója</string>
            <string language="en">Photo of a cony</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Foto eines Cony</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Photo d'un cony</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Foto de um cony</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foto di un cony</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτογραφία ενός cony</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Foto de un cony</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az eurázsiai füves puszták lakója, föld alatti járatokban él. Fülei kisebbek, mint észak-amerikai rokonáé.</string>
            <string language="en">Inhabitant of Eurasian steppes, lives in underground levels. Its ears are smaller, than its North American relative.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">nyúl,  emlősök,  adaptáció,  </string>
            <string language="en">hare, mammals, adaptation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einwohner der eurasischen Steppen, Leben in den 
unterirdischen Stufen. Seine Ohren sind, als sein 
nordamerikanischer Verwandter kleiner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Habitant des steppes eurasiennes, les vies dans 
les niveaux souterrains. Ses oreilles sont plus petites, que son
parent américain du nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habitante dos steppes eurasian, vidas em níveis 
subterrâneos. Suas orelhas são menores, do que seu parente 
norte-americano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abitante delle steppe eurasian, vite nei livelli 
sotterranei. I relativi orecchi sono più piccoli, che il 
relativo parente nordamericano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάτοικος των ευρασιατικών στεπών, ζωές στα υπόγεια 
επίπεδα. Τα αυτιά του είναι μικρότερα, από το 
βορειοαμερικανικό συγγενή του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Habitante de las estepas eurasiáticas, vidas en 
niveles subterráneos. Sus oídos son más pequeños, que su 
pariente norteamericano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hasen, Säugetiere, Anpassung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lièvres, mammifères, adaptation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hare, mamíferos, adaptação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lepri, mammiferi, adattamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λαγοί, θηλαστικά, προσαρμογή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">liebres, mamíferos, adaptación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74943</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
